abstract: In a move likely to fuel speculation over Yahoo‘s search for a new chief executive, the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has bought close to seven million additional shares of the Internet company, according to regulatory filings Friday.
lead_paragraph: In a move likely to fuel speculation over Yahoo‘s search for a new chief executive, the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has bought close to seven million additional shares of the Internet company, according to regulatory filings Friday.

headline.main: Icahn Raises His Stake in Yahoo to 5.5%
